result.description:
Displays a form for a given record. The activity will automatically complete when the completion conditions are satisfied.

Inputs:

  • Table - Table for the user form
  • Record - Record displayed in the user form
  • Form View - UI view to use in the user form
  • Form Fields - Fields to display in the user form
  • Display Fields - Label and value fields to display above the user form.
  • Footer - Displayed below the form.
  • Show Attachments - When selected, includes attachments in the user form.
  • Show SLA - When selected, shows an SLA timer for the record.
  • Show Checklist - When selected, shows a checklist for the record.
  • Assignment Group - (Optional) Group required to complete, skip or restart the activity.
  • Assigned To - (Optional) User required to complete, skip or restart the activity.

Outputs:

  • Table - Table for the user form
  • Record - Record updated in the user form
result.label: Autocompleting User Form
result.name: autocompleting_user_form

result.description:
Show a list view of records, for use with Agent Workspace Playbook experience. Process activity optionally waits before proceeding with process execution.

Inputs:

  • Wait for user input - Pauses process execution until user manually completes the process activity

Outputs:

  • Record - Flow Data Record.

Advanced Properties:

  • Assignment Group - (Optional) group to complete process data input
  • Assigned To - (Optional) user to complete process data input
result.label: Show List of Records
result.name: show_list_of_records_1

result.description: Request approval, for use in Creator Studio. Creates approval records for Users, Group members and/or the requestor's manager.
result.label: Request approval
result.name: add_approval_1

result.description: Takes in a collection of conditions to evaluate and output results.
result.label: Decision
result.name: decision

result.description:
Create a record on any ServiceNow table. When this activity runs, it will immediately finish and continue the process execution. You can dynamically add and configure fields for the record. Server-side validation rules are enforced (data policy, business rules, dictionary-defined mandatory fields), but UI policy does not apply.

Inputs:

  • Table Name - Table for new record
  • Fields - Field values for new record

Outputs:

  • Table - Table for the new record.
  • Record - Reference to record created.
result.label: Automated Create Record
result.name: automated_create_record

result.description:
Update an existing record on a ServiceNow table. When this activity runs, it will optionally wait for user confirmation before updating the record, then continue the process execution.. You can dynamically add and configure fields for the record. Server-side validation rules are enforced (data policy, business rules, dictionary-defined mandatory fields), but UI policy does not apply.

Inputs:

  • Table - Table for record update
  • Record - Record to receive updates
  • Fields - Field values to update
  • Wait for user input - Pauses process execution until user manually completes the process activity
  • Fields to show after creation - Record fields to show in agent Playbook agent experience once the update is complete

Outputs:

  • Table - Table for the new record.
  • Record - Reference to record created.

Advanced Properties:

  • Assignment Group - (Optional) group to complete process data input
  • Assigned To - (Optional) user to complete process data input
result.label: Update Record
result.name: update_record

result.description:
Show list of external links such as docs, videos in playbook UI.

Required Inputs:

  • External Links - [ { "title": "link title", "type": "document/video", "url": "link url" } ]
  • Wait for user input - Pauses process execution until user manually completes the process activity

Outputs:

  • Record - Flow Data Record
result.label: External Links
result.name: external_links

result.description:
Create task - Creates a child task in the Task table with the given inputs.

Inputs:

  • Group - Value of the group to assign the task to
  • Specific person - Value of the user to assign the task to
  • Short description - A brief description about the task to be created
  • Description - A description about the task to be created
  • Priority -Urgency of completion about the task to be created

Outputs:

  • Record - Task record
result.label: Create task
result.name: create_task

result.description:
Displays a form for a given record along. Users can update the record and manually mark the activity as complete or skipped.

Inputs:

  • Table - Table for the user form
  • Record - Record displayed in the user form
  • Form View - UI view to use in the user form
  • Form Fields - Fields to display in the user form
  • Display Fields - Label and value fields to display above the user form.
  • Footer - Displayed below the form.
  • Show Attachments - When selected, includes attachments in the user form.
  • Show SLA - When selected, shows an SLA timer for the record.
  • Show Checklist - When selected, shows a checklist for the record.
  • Assignment Group - (Optional) Group required to complete, skip or restart the activity.
  • Assigned To - (Optional) User required to complete, skip or restart the activity.

Outputs:

  • Table - Table for the user form
  • Record - Record updated in the user form
result.label: User Form
result.name: user_form_new

result.description:
Creates a checklist on a new or existing Task record and waits for all items in the checklist to be complete.

Inputs:

  • Checklist Template - Checklist template to attach to the Task. Required.
  • Task - Task record that the checklist is being attached to. If none is provided, one is created.
  • Can Skip - Whether or not a user can skip this activity.
  • Show SLA - Whether or not to display an SLA countdown for this Task.

Advanced Properties:

  • Skip Assignment Group - Group that is allowed to skip this activity if "Can Skip" is true.
  • Assigned To - User that is allowed to skip this activity if "Can Skip" is true.
result.label: Checklist Task from Template
result.name: checklist_task

result.description:
Wait for condition action causes the process to wait until the record matches the specified condition. Use this activity to block the process indefinitely, until a particular condition is met. You must populate the condition field.

Inputs:

  • Table - Table containing condition source record
  • Record - Record to wait for the specified update
  • Conditions - Conditions that must be met before completing this process activity
  • Assignment Group - Group of users who could skip this activity
  • Assigned To - User who could skip this activity

Outputs:

  • None
result.label: Wait For Condition
result.name: wait_for_condition_1

result.description:
Send Email - automatically sends a standard ServiceNow outbound email.

Inputs:

  • To - To recipient list
  • Cc - Cc recipient list
  • Bcc - Bcc blind copy recipient list
  • Subject - Subject of email
  • Body - Body of message
  • Target Record - Record the email will be attached to

Outputs:

  • Email - Email Record
result.label: Automated Send Email
result.name: automated_send_email

result.description:
Update an existing record on a ServiceNow table. When this activity runs, it will immediately finish and continue the process execution. You can dynamically add and configure fields for the record. Server-side validation rules are enforced (data policy, business rules, dictionary-defined mandatory fields), but UI policy does not apply.

Inputs:

  • Record - Record to receive updates
  • Table - Table for record update
  • Fields - Field values to update

Outputs:

  • Table - Table for the updated record.
  • Record - Reference to record updated.
result.label: Automated Update Record
result.name: automated_update_record

result.description:
Show a list view of records, for use with Agent Workspace Playbook experience. Process activity optionally waits before proceeding with process execution.

Inputs:

  • Table - Table to query
  • Conditions - Conditions to query for
  • Fields to show - Columns to show in list results
  • Wait for user input - Pauses process execution until user manually completes the process activity

Outputs:

  • Record - Flow Data Record.
  • Fields - Comma delimited list of columns specified in Fields to show input.

Advanced Properties:

  • Assignment Group - (Optional) group to complete process data input
  • Assigned To - (Optional) user to complete process data input
result.label: Show List of Records
result.name: show_list_of_records

result.description:
Creates a task on any ServiceNow task table.

Inputs:

  • Task table - Table name
  • Fields to prefill - Template Fields, dependent on Task Table
  • Wait - Wait for task record to be in an inactive state
result.label: Create Task
result.name: create_task_1

result.description:
Show Knowledge Article to Agent, for use with Agent Workspace Playbook Experience, allowing the process author to specify a specific Knowledge article to show in context and order defined in the process definition.

Inputs:

  • Title - Title that will be displayed in Playbook experience
  • Knowledge Article - Selected Knowledge article to show in Playbook experience
  • Wait for user input - Pauses process execution until user manually completes the process activity

Outputs:

  • Record - Flow Data Record.

Advanced Properties:

  • Assignment Group - (Optional) group to complete process data input
  • Assigned To - (Optional) user to complete process data input
result.label: Show Knowledge Article
result.name: show_knowledge_article

result.description:
Shows a list of approval records.

Inputs:

  • Table - Table to query
  • Conditions - Conditions to query for

Outputs:

  • Approval ID - User ID of Approval
  • Assigned To - User ID of Approver
  • State - Status of the record
result.label: View Approval Requests
result.name: view_approval_requests

result.description: This definition is used for best practices feature within security center.
result.label: Best Practice Activity
result.name: bestnpractice_activity

result.description:
Creates a child task for a given parent task.

Inputs:

  • Parent - Parent Task to associate with the child record.
  • Assigned To - Task assigned to
  • Short Description - Task short description
  • Description - Task description
  • Priority - Task priority
  • Collect Data From User - Make this as true to collect all the above inputs from agent experience. If this input is checked all above input values will be ignored.

Outputs:

  • Task Record - Child task record.
result.label: Create Child Task
result.name: create_child_task

result.description:
Creates a child case for a given parent case.

Inputs:

  • Parent - Parent case to associate with the child record.
  • Assignment Group - Case assignment group
  • Assigned To - Case assigned to
  • Short Description - Case short description
  • Description - Case description
  • Priority - Case priority
  • Collect Data From User - Make this as true to collect all the above inputs from agent experience. If this input is checked all above input values will be ignored.

Outputs:

  • Case Record - Child case record.
result.label: Create Child Case
result.name: create_child_case

result.description:
Execute rules in a decision table. When this activity runs, it will immediately finish and continue the process execution. The activity returns the result of the first matching decision rule, based on the rank of the rules. To return results from all matching rules, add the decision table to a subflow.

Inputs:

  • Decision Table - decision table to execute
  • Decision Table Inputs - input data the decision table will evaluate

Outputs:

  • Decision Result - result value(s) from the first matching decision row
result.label: Make a Decision - First Match
result.name: decision_table_first_result_evaluation

result.description:
Requests a manager approval on specified record.

Inputs:

  • Table Name - Requesting record table name.
  • Record - Record to request approval.
  • Approver - Approver for the approval request.
  • Due Date - Due Date for the approval request.
  • Comments - Comments for the approval request.

Outputs:

  • Approval Record - Approval request record.
result.label: Request Manager Approval
result.name: request_manager_approval

result.description:
Look up multiple records on any ServiceNow table. You can configure the conditions for the records found. The output includes a list of records and the number of records found. Note: The maximum number of records that can be returned is configured by a property and by default is 10K records. If more than 10K records are found, only the first 10K are returned.

Inputs:

  • Table - Table for record update
  • Conditions - Condition filter against target table

Outputs:

  • Record - List of records
  • Count - Count of records returned
result.label: Look Up Records
result.name: look_up_records

result.description:
Provide an Instruction to the process user, allowing for the process author to define a message to display,

Inputs:

  • Message - Description message that will be displayed in Playbook experience.
  • Wait for user input - Pauses process execution until user manually completes the process activity

Outputs:

  • Record - Flow Data Record
result.label: Instruction
result.name: simple_instruction

result.description: Create an email that will be sent to one or more users when certain conditions are met.
result.label: Send an email
result.name: send_email

result.description:
Requests Ad hoc Approval, for use with Playbook experience. Creates Ad hoc approval records for Users or Group members.

Inputs:

  • Approver - List of Approver for approval record.
  • Approver Group - User group for approval record.
  • Table - Table to query
  • Record - Record Associated for Approval

Outputs:

  • Approval Record - Approval Records.
  • Approval State - Approval Record state.
result.label: Request Ad Hoc Approval
result.name: request_ad_hoc_approval

result.description:
Create a user task.

When this activity runs, it will optionally prompt the user to confirm the assignment and task description.

Inputs:

  • Assigned To - User Form
  • Short Description - Task short description
  • Wait - Wait for task record to be in an inactive state

Outputs:

  • Table - Table for the new record.
  • Record - Reference to record created.

Advanced Properties:

  • Assigned To User for this Process Step - User allowed to perform this process activity
  • Assignment Group for this Process Step - Assignment group allowed to perform this process activity.
  • Wait for task completion - Wait until the associated task is no longer active, then continue the process execution.
  • Table - Table for the new record.
  • Additional Fields - Additional record fields.
  • Fields to show after record creation - Task fields to display once in the Agent Workspace.
result.label: Create Task
result.name: create_task

result.description:
Advanced Instruction for use with Agent Workspace Playbook Experience, allowing for the process author to define all labels and messages show in the instruction card.

Inputs:

  • Title - Title that will be displayed in Playbook experience
  • Description - Description message that will be displayed in Playbook experience.
  • Tag Line - Header tag-line message for Playbook experience component.
  • Footer - Footer message for Playbook experience component.
  • Wait for user input - Pauses process execution until user manually completes the process activity

Outputs:

  • Record - Flow Data Record

Advanced Properties:

  • Assignment Group - (Optional) group to complete process data input
  • Assigned To - (Optional) user to complete process data input
result.label: Advanced Instruction
result.name: advanced_instruction

result.description:
Displays a form for a given record along. Users can update the record and manually mark the activity as complete or skipped.

Inputs:

  • Table - Table for the user form
  • Record - Record displayed in the user form
  • Form View - UI view to use in the user form
  • Form Fields - Fields to display in the user form
  • Display Fields - Label and value fields to display above the user form.
  • Footer - Displayed below the form.
  • Show Attachments - When selected, includes attachments in the user form.
  • Show SLA - When selected, shows an SLA timer for the record.
  • Show Checklist - When selected, shows a checklist for the record.
  • Assignment Group - (Optional) Group required to complete, skip or restart the activity.
  • Assigned To - (Optional) User required to complete, skip or restart the activity.

Outputs:

  • Table - Table for the user form
  • Record - Record updated in the user form
result.label: User Form
result.name: user_form

result.description:
Send Email process activity, with optional confirmation of email subject and body. Email recipients are defined by the process author. Sends a standard ServiceNow outbound email.

Inputs:

  • To - Recipient user list for the email
  • To Email Address - Recipient email address. Emails separated by comma.
  • Cc - Cc recipient user list for the email
  • Cc Email Address - Cc recipient email address. Emails separated by comma.
  • Bcc - Bcc blind copy recipient userlist for the email
  • Bcc Email Address - Bcc blind copy recipient email address. Emails separated by comma.
  • Subject - Subject of the email
  • Body - Body of the email
  • Wait for user input - Option to pause the process until the end user manually completes or skips the activity

Outputs:

  • Record - Flow Data Record
  • Email - Email Record

Advanced Properties:

  • Assignment Group - Group responsible for completing the task associated with the activity
  • Assigned To - User responsible for completing the task associated with the activity
  • Table - Table for the target record
  • Target Record - Record that the system attaches the email to
result.label: Send Email
result.name: send_email

result.description:
Gather user responses for the playbook - prompt the user in runtime to answer questions or provide required inputs before proceeding. This activity replaces Collect User Data.

Inputs:

  • Questions - The questions or input variables that will prompt a response from the user.

Outputs:

  • Record - Reference to record containing collected data.
  • Question Responses - Input values based on the user's responses.

Advanced Properties:

  • Assignment Group for this process step - (Optional) group to complete process data input
  • Assigned To for this process step - (Optional) user to complete process data input
result.label: Questionnaire
result.name: questionnaire

result.description:
Placeholder activity to describe your process.

This activty is typically used as a temporary placeholder when an activity doesn't exist yet. Once the new activity is available, you may change the reference within your process to the new/other activity, and configure it into the process definition.

Note: this activity does not render in the Playbook Experience, and does nothing during process execution, it is just a placeholder.
result.label: Placeholder
result.name: placeholder

result.description:
Multi-step manual Instruction for use with Agent Workspace Playbook Experience, allowing for the process author to define an initial message, skipped message, and completed message to display to the agent.

Inputs:

  • Initial Message - Message to show when process activity is "In Progress"
  • Skipped Message - Message to show when process activity is "Skipped"
  • Completed Message - Message to show when process activity is "Complete"

Outputs:

  • Record - Flow Data Record.

Advanced Properties:

  • Assignment Group - (Optional) group to complete process data input
  • Assigned To - (Optional) user to complete process data input
result.label: Two Step Instruction
result.name: two_step_instruction

result.description:
Creates a checklist on a new or existing Task record and waits for all items in the checklist to be complete.

Inputs:

  • Checklist Items - A list of items to include in the checklist separated by line breaks. Required.
  • Checklist Name - A name to use for the checklist that is created.
  • Task - Task record that the checklist is being attached to. If none is provided, one is created.
  • Can Skip - Whether or not a user can skip this activity.
  • Show SLA - Whether or not to display an SLA countdown for this Task.
  • Checklist Owner - User that is set as the owner of this checklist.

Advanced Properties:

  • Skip Assignment Group - Group that is allowed to skip this activity if "Can Skip" is true.
  • Skip Assigned To - User that is allowed to skip this activity if "Can Skip" is true.
result.label: Checklist Task
result.name: checklist_task_from_items

result.description:
Requests Multi-Level Approval, for use with Playbook experience. Creates a multi level approval record for assigned to and Manager

Inputs:

  • Assigned To - Assigned to user for approval record.
  • Comments - Comments for approval record
  • Due Date - Due date for approval record
  • Table - Table to query
  • Record - Record Associated for Approval

Outputs:

  • Approval State - State can be approved or rejected.
result.label: Request Multi-Level Approval
result.name: request_multi_level_approval

result.description: Updates the input task record assignment group and/or assign to value with the chosen group and/or specific person value.
result.label: Assign to
result.name: assigned_to

result.description:
Plugin install activity will install list of plugins from the provided plugin query. Wait for user to start installation process.

Inputs:

  • Plugin Query - Encoded query of plugin's
    From v_plugin table filter list of plugin's need to be installed and use that encoded query in PAD builder.

Outputs:

  • Record - Flow Data Record.
result.label: Plugin Install
result.name: plugin_install

result.description:
Pause the process until an agent creates a record. Specify the table name where the record will be created, and specify the form view to display. This activity can pause a process indefinitely if the record is not created. If you never want to pause the process for user input, use the Automated Create Record activity instead.

The Now Platform validates the record prior to creation against your server-side rules such as business rules, data policies, and mandatory fields. The form runs any UI policies that apply. The system displays any validation error messages in the Workspace playbook.

Required Inputs:

  • Table Name - Table for new record

Optional Inputs:

  • Create Record View - Name of the form view to display
    • ;

Outputs:

  • Table - Table for the new record
  • Create Record View - Name of the form view displayed
  • Record Created - Sys ID of the record created
result.label: Create Record
result.name: create_record

result.description:
Wait for condition action causes the process to wait until the record matches the specified condition. Use this activity to block the process indefinitely, until a particular condition is met. You must populate the condition field.

Inputs:

  • Record - Record to wait for the specified update
  • Table
  • Conditions - Conditions that must be met before completing this process activity

Outputs:

  • None

Advanced Properties:

  • Enable timeout - (optional) timeout and automatically proceed after specified duration
  • Duration - (optional) only valid if Enable timeout is checked
  • Schedule - (optional) only valid if Enable timeout is checked, and used to account for scheduled work days or durations
result.label: Wait For Condition
result.name: wait_for_condition

result.description:
Gather user input for the process - prompt the user to enter a list of inputs before proceeding. This activity is used to collect data from the agent or user, for use later in the processs.

Inputs:

  • User form for data collection - The definition of inputs to collect from the user
  • Wait for user input - Pauses process execution until user manually completes the process activity

Outputs:

  • Record - Reference to record containing collected data.

Advanced Properties:

  • Assignment Group for this process step - (Optional) group to complete process data input
  • Assigned To for this process step - (Optional) user to complete process data input
result.label: Collect User Data
result.name: collect_data

result.description:
With this task, Guided setup/Process authors can embed any page inside an iframe using page url. Embedded page will be displayed in the playbook UI.

Inputs:

  • URL - URL of the page that will be displayed in Playbook experience.
  • Wait for user input - Pauses setup/process execution until user manually completes the guided setup task

Outputs:

  • Record - Flow Data Record
result.label: Iframe
result.name: iframe
